channel.title: OverDosePking RELEASE
channel.description:
I've decided to release a server I've been working on for a little while. This used to be a cammy-pvp base. I have edited so much of this. It's almost like its not even a cammy-pvp server anymore.
Credits: Demise - client and a few other things, Me of course, My friend Rj for his base.
Features: -474 bow animation -ALL proper gs stances and emotes. -All Godswords have proper effect (e.g - sgs heals the amount of damage the spec deals) -All knives work -All spirit shields added -Monsters drop cash for starting an economy if you would like -1 wave jad required to wear fire cape -Donator shop including pk wings and donator cape among other items -PvP point exchange with many common items -Chaos Elemental custom mini game - explained in picture -Perfect veng with emotes and proper delays -NEAR perfect dclaw special added with emote and 4 hits -Godwars added - no kill count required. -Barrows - 95% working. (just needs the doors and such..) -Equipment screen - shows item bonuses -New teleport emote and gfx -Piety and Chivalry work 100% -A train area for those who dont want to use commands. -New home - players seemed to like it better. -New models including dharok's axe and whip -Dharok's armor has proper effect - (hits higher with low hp) -Perfect anti-syi and anti-null -ReloadShops command to refresh the items in the shop without restarting server -Teleport in combat fixed 100% -Multipk for FFA battles or Teams -Statius and Vesta armor added with 100% ints -Reset(stat) commands to reset any skills you may have messed up. -Unban, Unmute, Unipban, Unipmute all work. -2 donators rights for extra benefits given to large donors. -2nd donor right - doesnt lose items, access to donor shop, gets access to extra commands. -1st donor right - loses items, access to donor shop, access to some commands. -Jail now works as it didnt in cammy-pvp -Added trading - is very buggy though. Fixed the trading dupes though. Commands to turn it on and off added. -Mypks command added to check how many points you have. -Killrow system added for extra points for kill streaks. -showbank and showinv commands added -Yell with titles based on amount of kills. -PM logs added -More things you will find out when you test the server out. Good luck.
Pictures: [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source13.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source12.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/source11.jpg[/img]

item.title: OverDosePking RELEASE
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Hello Visions, I played the server when the home was at lumbridge and there was a pking points random item crate and stuff. I had fun and hope to use this source! I quit when you changed the home to edgevile and no one was ever on plus everyone was reset. Fun server and glad to see it again

EDIT: I keep getting this compiling error any help?

Applet_Sub1.java:9: cannot access sign.signlink
bad class file: .\sign\signlink.class
class file has wrong version 50.0, should be 49.0
Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa
th.
import sign.signlink;
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: OverDosePking RELEASE
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Um, there are clearly TWO different servers/client shown in the pictures. This can be seen by the client interfaces, certain items (eg different fire cape model in some pics). Different NPC spawns (eg if you look at minimap there is Kills Exchange shop outside Edgeville bank, on another pic it’s not there) and also in the chatbox the staff crown changes and the line above where the player types also changes, the report abuse button changes to view scoreboard…

This is a mixture of Demise PK’ing V5 and Cammy PVP pics.

Read full topic

i dl both but when i click login it wont??? any suggestions?[/quote]

item.title: OverDosePking RELEASE
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

oldschool-scape:

how can i change the Ip of your server to the 0.0.0.0 i cant find any gui and i searshed in the client and there isnt any Ip i can change so is this advertisment??? or just a dumb ass reaction of me?? anyways help me out plz??

oh, sorry i forgot to change the ip to localhost before i uploaded it. search in client.java for “Overdose” and change that to your ip.

[quote=“babbu1master, post:43, topic:351098”]hey help me about this im new umm why there is download client or dowload server what is the diffrence??
from ur friend :babbu1master [/quote]
The server is what the game is itself. Its the makeup of files and such that make the game. The client allows you to simply access the game.

Read full topic
